comments:
I received this error when trying to "validate settings" against http://issues.apache.org/jira using a valid login and password.

Steffen, have you seen this before?  

Matt: the failure is due to a javax.activation class missing, what VM are you running?  Can you reproduce with a clean install?

No, I have not seen this error. It works fine on my system. The initialization code is in SoapJiraService, it invokes: this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("client-config.wsdd") to read the configuration file. Could it possibly pick up the wrong file from the class path?
Matthew: this looks like a configuration error since you are missing the javax classes.  If you can reproduce with a clean install please reopen.
